GOLD PAINT BOY

is the name I write and record music under. They are mostly small love songs and songs about dogs and are pretty short but sweet. I'm hoping to add some new songs about getting on the dance floor in the near future. Here are some albums I've recorded, some photos and video, and I plan to add some unreleased recordings. Take a listen, hope you enjoy, there will be more to come.
